fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Watch a player's house from afar.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn everyone who visits them, and if your target visits anyone.
- You scare off all visitors to your target, causing their ability to fail.
- On full moons, as you are more visible, your target's ability will also fail.
- You cannot cause a Spirit's ability to fail.
